comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Adams was pitching for the Cubs in Savannah against the Yankees that spring: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9803E3DE153EE033A... He played in the majors in 1914 and 1915, but remained in the minors until 1925. Since this is presumably a Savannah Colts uniform, the picture must date from when he played for them , 1913. www.baseball-reference.com/players/a/adamska01.shtml www.baseball-reference.com/minors/player.cgi?id=adams-001kar
